title: Aeon Flux (Animated) M-TV's 3 Disc Set
description:
Aeon Flux is an avant garde American science fiction animated television series that aired on MTV. It premiered in 1991 on MTV&#039;s Liquid Television experimental animation show as a six-part serial of short films, followed in 1992 by five individual short episodes. In 1995 a season of ten half-hour episodes aired as a stand-alone series.

Aeon Flux was created by Korean American animator Peter Chung (also the man behind Phantom 2040, which used the same animation style as Aeon Flux). A live action motion picture loosely based upon the series and starring Charlize Theron was released in late 2005.
